name: 陳玟心
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
Week 1: Course Introduction
Week 2: Introduction and Strategies to Part 1
Week 3: Introduction and Strategies to Part 2
Week 4: Practice Test Parts 1 & 2
Week 5: Introduction and Strategies to Part 3
Week 6: Introduction and Strategies to Part 4
Week 7: Practice Test Parts 3 & 4
Week 8: Introduction and Strategies to Part 5
Week 9: Grammar
Week 10: Introduction and Strategies to Part 6
Week 11: Practice Test Parts 5 & 6
Week 12: Introduction and Strategies to Part 7
Week 13: Practice Test Part 7
Week 14: Grammar and Vocabulary Introduction 1
Week 15: Grammar and Vocabulary Introduction 2
Week 16: Mock TOEIC test 1
Week 17: Mock TOEIC test 2
Week 18: No class
